file.content:
#!/bin/sh
# Entire CLI hooks
# Commit-msg hook: strip trailer if no user content (allows aborting empty commits)
export PATH="/sessions/pensive-cool-noether/.local/bin:$PATH"
entire hooks git commit-msg "$1" || exit 1

entire hooks git pre-push "$1" || true
